reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute and appreciate its soft fabric. They like the sizing, with one customer noting it's true to size. The quality receives mixed feedback, with one customer describing it as poorly made.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shipping takes forever
items.body: This sweater is absolutely beautiful. Shipping took forever. Read more
items.author: Desmond Underwood-Dan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Better than expected. Good material. Read more
items.author: Kay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bold, Cozy & Effortlessly Chic
items.body: Absolutely love this top! The black-and-white design is bold yet classy, making it easy to dress up or down. The fabric is soft and cozy, perfect for staying stylish and warm. Shop my storefront! https://www.amazon.com/shop/theshepardfamily?ref_=cm_sw_r_cp_ud_aipsfshop_2CNCFEG1JS0JVYSEB4KF_2 Read more
items.author: Chrissy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as Advertised ‐ Small Problem
items.body: As the title says..as advertised. The crop starts just above the belly button. True to size. I wear medium and purchased medium. The sleeves have a little extra fabric. To be worn long [touching your hands] or pushed up to the elbow. Only problem the hot pink color is that it isn't as vibrant as pictured. So the pants I wanted to wear with it don't work with it. I'm thinking about keeping it. Read more
items.author: Dr. Aquanetta Copeland

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater but...
items.body: The threads snag on lots of things! Cute sweater though but the snagging is annoying Read more
items.author: Nicole Graves

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really cute crop sweater
items.body: Wasn’t as thick as I thought it was from the pics but it was still fire! Read more
items.author: Bee Aaron

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it
items.body: I purchased the Pink one in Large and it fits perfectly. Sleeves are long the way I like it not to short and material feels great. Can’t wait to wear it. About to get the Purple and Black one too Read more
items.author: Kristian

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pink sweater
items.body: Colorful and looks exactly like the pic received a lot of compliments Read more
items.author: LaLa

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
